Name: Name Change, Captain Patrick J. Brown Walk, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to a park walkway name, Captain Patrick J. Brown Walk, Borough of Manhattan.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1.  The following park walkway name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits

Captain Patrick J. Brown Walk	(none)			a walkway located within East River  
Park between East 14th Street and East 18th Street
								
______________________________________________________________________________		
      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
